scripts.test_unix: AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8008 LOG4JS_CONFIG=./test/test_log4js.json LOG4JS_DISABLE_LOGSTASH=true ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/test.js --reporter spec -t 10000
scripts.test_win: SET AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice&SET AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8008&SET LOG4JS_CONFIG=test\test_log4js.json&SET LOG4JS_DISABLE_LOGSTASH=true& node .\node_modules\mocha\bin\mocha --reporter spec -t 10000
